creditline: Bequest of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
inscription: 天保七丙申四月八日　極楽ノ初舞台　深窓院梅我日鮮信士　俗名岩井半四郎　行年三十八歳　深川浄心寺 {Tenpō 7 hinoesaru shigatsu yōka, gokuraku no hatsubutai, Shinsō-in Baiga Nissō Shinji, zokumei Iwai Hanshirō, gyōnen sanjūhassai, Fukagawa Jōshinji} | death poem: しばらくと申せとけしのついちりぬ　奈木 {Shibaraku to mōse to keshi no tsui chirinu Naki} | inset picture: うけ故瀬川菊之丞 {uke ko Segawa Kikunojō}
markings: censor seal: 極 {kiwame}; publisher's seal: 司馬越平 {Shiba Kohei}
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e), ink and color on paper
signed: 香蝶楼國貞画 {Kōchōrō Kunisada ga}
title: Memorial Portrait of the Actor Iwai Hanshirō VI with Segawa Kikunojō V
